message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a product that I believe would be incredibly valuable to you.  Given its potential, I'm initially proposing a price of $1,400,000. I'm open to discussing this further, of course. What are your thoughts?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I'm looking to stay within my budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $1,200,000?

Bob, I understand your desire to work within your budget.  While $1,200,000 is a bit lower than I'd hoped, I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about $1,300,000?  I believe this price reflects the true value of the product.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. After careful consideration, I am still looking to keep my expenses within my budget. Could we possibly agree on $1,250,000 for the product?
